props.description: The content of the stepper, which should be one or more Step components.
props.title: children

props.description: Specifies the direction of the stepper. This prop accepts one of the following values: vertical or horizontal.
props.title: direction

props.description: The content of the step, which can include text, icon, or other React elements.
props.title: children

props.description: The title of the step. This provides a brief summary of the step's purpose.
props.title: title

props.description: A more detailed description of the step. This can provide additional context or instructions.
props.title: description

props.description: Indicates whether the step is currently active. An active step is typically highlighted to show that it is the current step.
props.title: active

props.description: Indicates whether the step has been completed. A completed step is usually marked with a checkmark or other indicator.
props.title: done
